cobblemon.species.studysama.name: Studysama
cobblemon.species.neuroplushie.name: Neuroplushie
cobblemon.species.neurosama.name: Neurosama
cobblemon.species.evilplushie.name: Evilplushie
cobblemon.species.vedal.name: Vedal
cobblemon.species.vedal-giga.name: Vedal
cobblemon.species.gymbag.name: Gymbag
cobblemon.species.gymbag.desc: They possess retractable propellers attached to the white handles, and the straps are used as limbs. Loners are extremely rare among the species. They prefer to gather in large swarms led by a single leader.
cobblemon.ability.whenyouregone.desc: Defeated allies give Neurosama determination, slightly increasing her Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats when she enters a battle.
cobblemon.ability.abberdemon.desc: Evilneuro is possessed by an otherworldly entity that can occasionally attack foes when she uses a move on herself.
cobblemon.ability.fatheroftheyear.desc: Vedal transforms into his Giga form when he switches in after one of his creations faints.
cobblemon.move.boom.desc: The user unleashes its inner demon, causing a powerful explosion. The move also gains an attack bonus from the dark type.
